DzOpenGLShader Class Reference

Base class for GLSL shaders used in DAZ Studio. More...

Inheritance diagram for DzOpenGLShader:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class for GLSL shaders used in DAZ Studio.

This class implements all the compiling and linking functionality necessary to use a GLSL shader, subclasses need only supply the code for the shader, and provide functionality to set parameters for the shader.
